mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Lyman Hall to Mrs. Street, 1785 May 2
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hall, Lyman, 1724-1790
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lyman Hall, Governor of Georgia and signer of the Declaration of Independence, writes to Mrs. Street (possibly his sister) regarding health and life post Revolutionary war. Autograph letter signed, 1 page. Separate fragment of clipped address panel.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States -- History -- Revolution, 1775-1783
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Wayne Rickert Collection of Founders' Autographs
